title: Best chocolate ice cream ever!
comment: Absolutely loved it! The Belgian cocoa gives it such a rich flavor. My kids finished the whole tub in one sitting!

title: Authentic mango taste
comment: Tastes like fresh Alphonso mangoes. Not too sweet, just perfect. Will definitely order again!

title: Worth every penny
comment: The pistachio flavor is so authentic and the saffron adds a royal touch. Premium quality!

title: Delicious brownie chunks
comment: The brownie pieces are generous and gooey. Chocolate flavor could be a bit stronger though.

title: Just like traditional kulfi!
comment: Reminds me of kulfi from my childhood. The cardamom and saffron balance is perfect.

title: Perfect vanilla!
comment: Clean vanilla flavor, not artificial at all. The cone is crispy and fresh.
